author: ColdFusion
description:
Try Odoo for free: https://www.odoo.com/r/S0w

Mark Zuckerberg's Metaverse was supposed to be the next version of the internet. Instead it largely sits abandoned after billions of dollars in spending. What happened? In this episode we explore.

title: What Happened to the Metaverse?
